🎨 Taggz.art: A Chrome Extension to Tag the Web with your Art and Voice 🖌️

Unleash your creativity with Taggz.art, a game that transforms the internet into your canvas. Tag the web with your own digital paintings, leaving behind graffiti-style artwork for others to discover. Whether you're a casual doodler or a serious artist, Taggz.art lets you express yourself and connect with a community of like-minded creators. 🌐

🛠️ Get Started: Create your free account at Taggz.art to unlock its full potential!

Getting Started 🚀
	Create an Account: Visit Taggz.art and sign up for a free account.
	Install the Extension: Add the Taggz.art Chrome extension to your browser.
	Log In and Explore: Use your new account to log in and start tagging the web with your art!

Features ✨

🎨 Tag Websites: Turn any website into your canvas! Use the Taggz.art extension to paint and leave your mark on the internet with custom digital graffiti that others can see and interact with.

🎭 Customizable Characters: Design your own avatar to represent you in the digital art world. More to come!

🔍 Follow & Discover: Explore a constantly evolving world of street art across the web and follow your favorite artists.

🏅 Leaderboard: Compete with other players to climb the ranks and showcase your artwork on the global leaderboard. Earn recognition for your creative tags!

💰 Tipping System: Show appreciation for other artists' work by sending tips (pts.) and earn recognition for your creations.

💬 In-Game Chat: Connect with other players in real-time and share your thoughts, ideas, and art tips directly within Taggz.art.

🎮 Minigames & Character Journey (Stretch Goal!): Embark on an epic journey to level up your character and unlock new customization options through fun minigames. 🏆

🤝 Co-Op Mode (Stretch Goal): Team up with friends or other players to collaborate on large-scale tags and art projects across the web!

🛍️ Player Merch (Stretch Goal!): Customize your in-game experience with exclusive merch designed for true art lovers.

🛒 In-App Purchases: Inside Taggz.art, you can buy points to support other artists through our tipping system or unlock exclusive items in the character builder. While merchandise featuring your own artwork is part of our future stretch goals, for now, points are the main way to enhance your experience and show love to fellow creators. Stay tuned for more exciting in-app purchase options as we grow!

Taggz.art is more than just an extension—it's a social experience where art, community, and technology come together. Change the way you browse the web and start tagging today! 🖼️🎉
